dateFormat.heading: Format a date
dateFormat.text: Returns a globally set format of a date

timeSince.heading: Time Since
timeSince.subHeading: Returns time since a specified date
timeSince.text: Returns the time since a given date

timeUntil.heading: Time Until
timeUntil.subHeading: Returns time until a specified date
timeUntil.text: Returns time until a specified date
